Package uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.session.token

Support for token based authentication.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BearerTokenService
    A AppContextService that encapsulates the policy for bearer token authentication.
    ScopeQuery
    Interface for objects that can be queried for scope values
    UserInfoContributor<T extends AppUser>
    A DataContributor that adds data to the Oauth user info endpoint Add a Scopes annotation to set global access control.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ErrorCodes
    Standard Bearer token error codes
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Scopes  

Package uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.session.token Description

Support for token based authentication. This package just defines the interfaces needed to integrate with the general authentication flow.
